encyclopedia.content: 词典解释读法与释义： trendy：['trendi] 形容词 a. 时髦的；流行的 trendy clothes 时髦的衣服 名词 n. 赶时髦的人；追求时髦者 例句与用法： Look at that trendy couple- kitted up all the latest gear! 瞧那对时髦夫妇，打扮多么入时。 词形变化 副词： trendily 形容词比较级： trendier 形容词最高级： trendiest 名词： trendiness 名词复数： trendies 组合词：trendyfavor trendy和fashionable的区别 trendy 是一个口语

entry.def: If you say that something or someone is trendy, you mean that they are very fashionable and modern.

example.tran: 衣着时髦的中产阶级年轻人

entry.def: If you describe someone who follows new ideas as trendy, you disapprove of them because they are more interested in being fashionable than in thinking seriously about these ideas.

example.ex: Trendy teachers are denying children the opportunity to study classic texts.
example.tran: 赶时髦的教师正在剥夺孩子学习经典课本的机会。
